question: India has decided to explore connectivity routes via INST Corridor, along with which country, during its virtual bilateral summit?
explanation:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Uzbekistan President Shavkat Mirziyoyev participated in a virtual bilateral summit.
Both the countries signed 9 pacts and agreed to widen counter-terror partnership. They also decided to explore connectivity routes via International Northâ€“South Transport Corridor (INSTC).
